评论详情: It's been at least a couple years since I bought this top and it's still holding up. The fabric is a little heavier than I thought it would be, but it flows nicely. Just this year (again, it's been like 3 or 4 years since I bought it) is the top beginning to exhibit wear and tear issues (fraying thread, a small hole somewhere), so the value and quality of the top is top notch. Coming back to the site to hopefully get a new one in the same color and possibly another. Thanks!

评论概述: Awesome edition to the closet for many uses
评论详情: Says what i mean: I initially got it to work in a cold weather climate thinking I could use the shirt and hood and have a layer underneath too. Not only does it work as expected, but the size was spot on, doesn't "catch" on things making it have little thingy's and threads popping out - its amazing and smooth. The hood is NOT tight so it looks cool and is comfortable to turn your head and wear buds underneath while walking etc or at the gym if its cold there. When you sweat there are NO huge giant disgusting sweat bands under the arms. Its NOT changing after 5 washings so far. Still fits the exact same as the first time.  Hope it stays ...I bought a second one so the next 5 years I'll always have one handy. I hate clothes shopping soI need things to last. Cheers
Comfortable, not too wrinkled

This shirt is soft and exactly the length I wanted.  It fits me a bit weird but nothing that will deter me from wearing it.  It's just a bit tight in the stomach, has very loose sleeves and the hood is kind of big.  I bought several shirts off of Amazon and this one was the most expensive one, and also probably my least favorite of all that I ordered.  I do like it, though, but considering the price may or may not buy a second one.  I got the blue one.  The color is pretty and has not faded.  I was it on cold, wrong side out, and hang dry.  Customer service was great.

This hoodie is super thin, the pocket is small and looks a little strange, I am pretty sure it said it has to be hand washed (which I am not going to do).  The style is ok, I guess?  I'm not super impressed...I just wear it work.  The color is a true black, so that's good and I have machine washed and dried (on medium heat once or twice with no issue.  I did wash it with like colors the first time, just in case.

I was pleasantly surprised on the material. It's heavy but also light weight. Perfect for fall and winter to wear underneath a jacket. I think it runs big. I am 200lbs, 5'4. I have a very big busy 45inchs. The material stretches so perfect. This does not seem cheap at all. It have long sleeves and it covers my butt. Perfect for my curves!  I'm so in love with this hoodie. It's not a sweatshirt but it's heavy so it still gives some warmth. I got the purple one. I wish i could get  more colors

I love this sweatshirt. It is the perfect weight. Runs a tiny bit small  (I wear L or XL) so I ordered the XL for a looser fit and it felt like a slim fit. But I still like it. The blue color is more royal than what I thought in the picture so I am returning and going to order a different color. Overall, this is a great top!
Nice style & fit but thin material.
Lindo producto

The fit and material are comfortable and I like the length for wearing with leggings or yoga pants.  Perfect casual top for being cozy at home or out and about.  Maybe slightly looser around the waist than I was expecting, but not a deal breaker. Stitching was a little wonky.  I had to cut a few loose threads, but I have worn and washed it and it seems fine.
Really like it! Normally I am a size small, but medium was recommended and it is great! Was hoping in might be “thicket weight fabric, like a sweat shirt ), but I love it !!

评论概述: Gray feels itchy, black is polyester - not rayon.
评论详情: Not great fabric on the gray heathered. Ordered the black which is soft but not rayon. Fabric is 95% polyester.
Love the color and the styling but material is much less substantial than anticipated. The garment is more t-shirt than sweat shirt.

Sometimes when you work in a gym you need something light to take the chill off, but not make you too warm. I love this! I ordered the blue and I wear it a lot. I ordered it in purple and they sent it to the wrong address and when I tried to reorder it they were out of that color. Wish they had more colors. For reference I am 5’5” and 123 pounds and medium was good as it runs small.

Love the color of this. Tried it on many times before I made the decision to return it. Fabric was nice, color great, but something was off for me. Figured it out. I did not like how small the front pockets are. I tried on some other shirts that I had ordered also and they looked better on. It was because the proportion of their pockets on the shirt was correct, where this one was not.

Really cute, but way too small. I ordered my usual size and it was extremely tight Update: I'm increasing my number of stars due to the amazing customer service I have received from this seller. They saw my post about the product being too small and offered me a discount if I wanted to go ahead and keep it. I gave it to my daughter who is 5'7" and weighs 108. It is nice and baggy on her and long enough. She has a long torso and very long arms. I did order a 2XL for myself, because the top really is cute. It is still a bit snug and the arm length is very long. I don't mind that since I also have long arms and rarely get to push up my sleeves. The trick will be in wearing a tight thin shirt underneath for layering.

评论概述: Great hoodie for leggings & true to size
评论详情: I selected “fits as expected” when I really mean “fits better than expected,” like it’s true to the measurements posted in the listing, but the weight and drape of the material is just really nice and even though the size I ordered is certainly loose, the top is still cute and appears fitted without feeling fitted. For reference, I am 5’5, about 200 ish lbs, usually wear a large or xl in tops and I ordered the 2xl  Update: I bought the XL. You know how we have that pesky pandemic? Well, I bleach everything, and these shirts bleach INSTANTLY, so my 2XL hoodie now has tons of little bleach spots on it, whoops. Exercise caution when cleaning in these! Anyway, the XL is perfect, I'm thinking about getting the wine color in XL now.

评论概述: I love this! Fits very nice
评论详情: I love this! Fits very nice, I ordered a size up because the material is a little thin and stretchy and I didn't want it to be too tight in the mid section and it is perfect! Nice high quality material. I ordered the navy blue and the color is true to the picture. This is very long which is what I like, I am almost 5'7 and it falls perfectly on me but if you are on the shorter side it may be a little too long. The only reason I gave 4 stars is because the first time I washed it the hood string came out and I can't get it back in, but no biggie it doesn't make much of a difference.

评论概述: PERFECT with leggings - ordered up a few sizes (typically a M but ordered XL)
评论详情: I LOVE THIS TOP! I'm so glad I followed the recommendation to order larger than you typically wear, as commented in other reviews. For reference, I'm 5'8", 155 lbs. and typically wear a size M top and size 10 pants. I ordered an XL and it is PERFECT. I ordered it specifically to wear with leggings and jeggings, so I didn't want it to cling. I am small chested (34B) with narrow shoulders and carry my weight mostly through my hips and thighs. I was worried that the shoulders and chest would be really baggy with the XL, but that isn't the case. The shirt drapes SO nicely, doesn't drown my shoulders or waist, and flows over my hips. I ordered black and will definitely get more! I have long arms too, so the XL gave me the length I need. I plan on washing it on delicate and line-drying to avoid possibly shrinking the shirt.
Love the color , should have ordered a size smaller, but I am comfortable with this one covers my backside well
Looks good, fits well, size seems true, nice light weight, good color.

评论概述: The color of green is more of a Hunter Green (dark) than Kelly Green
评论详情: I was hoping for a more Christmas or St Patrick's Day kind of green, like the picture seems to look, but it's more of a dark hunter green. It also fit closer than I'd like in the size L (I usually wear tops in XL, but they didn't have it so I ordered one in L and one in XXL. Haven't received that one yet, but I'm holding out hope). I'll keep one of them, whichever one fits, even though the color's not quite what I was hoping. Still nice, and comfy.
So cute on. Looks just like the picture on. Great blue color…I bought an army green one also.
Really like this shirt, I am 5’8 and 200lbs. Looks good with legging and not to heavy to wear In the fall, can wear a light jacket over it too.

I ordered the army green hoody in a medium and it's perfect. Roomy, but not too big. It's soft and it hangs well on my body. It is fairly long enough to wear with just leggings...just depends on how long you like shirts, but it does adequately cover your bottom. I'd order more colors for sure!
Poorly mad, the cheap material doesn’t help. Not worth $5
This runs a bit large, but is super soft & runs true to color. Perfect length for leggings.

评论概述: Great vibrant color, can wear with anything! Over and under!
评论详情: Definitely purchase a size up unless you want to emphasize all the lovely, flattering...or unflattering in some cases...curves. The material is really nice, a soft, stretchy cloth. I wouldn't say this is winter material, rather it's more of a spring or fall apparel. Interestingly enough, it's not exactly a shirt, but it's not totally a hoodie either. It's one of those tunics that you can wear fancy or casual. It does look nice with leggings but if you were it with pants, it still looks amazing. The color is vibrant and does not come off in the wash. Don't wash with hot water though. I put it in the dryer until it was about 80% dry and then slung it over a chair. Beautiful <3
Super soft and works equally well with jeans as with leggings. Lightweight so I layer something under it.

I love this and plan to buy another in black ( I ordered the hunter green color). I am normally a size M, and am 5"9.5 but I chose the Large. It is surprisingly fitted for a Large sweatshirt, but perfectly accommodates my small bump at 6 months pregnant.  I would also order a Large even if I wasn't pregnant. The sleeves and sides are very nicely tailored for a size Large, not baggy at all. I wouldn't want to give up any more length- I LOVE that these cover the butt/front of leggings or athletic pants. It will layer nicely with other winter pieces for our harsh winters. It isn't a traditional sweatshirt material, but is soft and a nice weight for the price.
Love this, but it’s definitely more of a shirt material than a sweatshirt. It’s cute, size fits great but it’s definitely thin

评论概述: I really liked this sweater when I first received it
评论详情: I really liked this sweater when I first received it. The pouch is a little funny and makes me think of a kangaroo but it's really comfy. I even got a couple compliments on it for as basic as it is. The only big negative thing I've found with it, is that it SMELLS. Like, sitting in the washer for hour smells. The weird thing is, anytime I've washed it, I immediately put it in the dryer. It doesn't sit in the washer ever. The tag says it's fine to wash. I don't know what is causing that smell but I can't really wear it in public anymore because it's not an easy to ignore smell. Spraying things on it to help doesn't help either. It bums me out cause it's super comfy. I'll just have to wear it at home and smell I guess.

评论概述: Very soft and comfortable lightweight  tunic/sweatshirt
评论详情: I had been waiting for an order of a green shirt from this company in this same style which never arrived.  I ordered this one in black and love it!  It is a lightweight sweatshirt/tunic/top.  I wear a tank underneath and it is very comfortable.  When it gets cold I add a fleece vest or a flannel shirt and it looks so cute.  This is a tunic length so I can wear this with tight jeans, or leggings.  Perfect for going to yoga class, doing errands or any other chore.  I am very happy with this purchase and will order more in other colors.
Little disappointed, very thin material and not warm.

评论概述: Great for underneath coats with no hood
评论详情: I got this specifically as a lightweight shirt with a hood that would go under my olive green faux leather jacket for a Green Arrow cosplay I'm working on. It is perfect! The color matches the olive pants I have. It looks brown in certain types of lighting, but that's how that color is. I ordered the Army Green in an X-Large based on bust size. When going to comic-cons, faux leather jackets get pretty hot and I didn't want something too heavy underneath. Really happy I found this! Also, make sure to tie the string in 3 knots before putting it in the washer so the string doesn't get stuck in the hood.
Exactly what I wanted, a thin hoodie. The bulky ones are too much for me. True to color and size. Glad I bought it.
Very good product..made with great quality materials
Fits me very nicely. Not TOO long and very comfortable.
Love. Just what I was looking for. Long but not too long. Fit is great. Light but not too light. Good price.

Soft and lightweight.  I love the Aquamarine color.  It's exactly what I wanted.  It hits below the hips but not quite below the butt on me so I wouldn't be comfortable wearing with leggings. I'm 5'6",  195 and long waisted, so it will longer on shorter waisted people.  I normally wear a size 16, 38DDD and XL.  I looked at the size chart and ordered the XXL.  It fit great so I would say the size chart is accurate and you should order a size up.

评论概述: Perfect sweat shirt for travel, layering or laying around
评论详情: Love this shirt so much that I immediately bought a second the day it arrived. We are traveling overseas soon and This will be perfect for walking around and layering. Also the material is soft and the hood/neck area flattering. I’m 5’8” with a long torso and arms, 165ish lbs.

Update! And somehow, hours after i was told my package was given to someone else, someone delivered it between the screen and front door!! Thank you Amazon for making it right! And as for the product? I typically wear small but i intentionally ordered medium bc i wanted this tunic slightly oversized. It was the perfect choice!! I love it!! The fabric is so soft!! If you order expecting jersey favric or a sweatshirt your gonna be disappointed. But this is more like a soft heavier T thats really VERY comfortable and cozy. I have a feeling this is gonna be one of my favorite go to casuals!!!

Most of the reviews I read before purchasing this described the shirt as being soft. Jersey cotton and Sherpa are soft. I would describe this material as slinky. Not to say that it isn't soft, it reminds me of the athletic apparel material that is so popular. I'm generally freezing cold but have to layer because I never know when I'll heat up. I purchased a size larger than normal to allow for layering and it's perfect.
Best purchase for traveling.  Keeps you warm, but is not bulky or hard to pack.
This shirt/hoodie is not only comfortable it’s extremely stylish. I only wish I had went down a size. A medium was big but I was ok with the extra room.

So I total  ordered this by accident by hitting the one click buy button, which I disabled for the future… Anyway, this is a very thin hoodie. Definitely not worth $26 in my opinion, but I’m going to keep it because it is something nice to wear around the house or even just running errands with some leggings on. It fits sort of on the fitted side, very thin stretch material and comfotable. I ordered a medium, I am 5’7 and currently 21 weeks pregnant weighing 145 and it actually fits pretty decent, you can see the baby bump clearly but it’s a good fit and good arm length.

评论概述: Excellent - great for us tall/plus girls too.
评论详情: I'm 5'10 and wear a 14/16. I ordered DO so it wouldn't be tight and it fit perfect.  It's not sweatshirt material. It is very comfortable and stretchy. I am also happy the sleeves are plenty long and the shirt covers my bum. I bought blue and it's beautiful.  It is also durable. Ive washed it a few times. I do hang all my tops as I feel dryers cause the shape to change on any top I buy..  Will order another color  now so I have it in my wardrobe. Highly recommend.

I love how it looks and it’s very soft, as well as comfortable. The only thing I’d like to note is, it’s heavy and it ran a little big. I typically wear a medium and the medium was baggy on me, but hey that might be how they want it to fit. The hood felt heavy, and it’s heavy to wash. Haha. Can’t complain though, it’s cute! I felt like little red riding hood.

评论概述: I love the lightweight and shape
评论详情: I love this sweater!! I’ve bought quite a few! My only complaint is they don’t last long, the pocket always gets a hole with 2-3 washes. Other then that, these are perfect light weight for the gym or with jeans and heels.!
Comfortable! Love the army green.

Purchased as a gift for my Mom. It was thinner material than I expected, but was still a nice fabric. It is definitely a slim fit, so it worked for her thin, athletic shape. Probably would not work for a curvy gal like me bc the fabric isn’t very stretchy. It is athleisure wear, so she plans to wear it working in the yard or to the gym.

评论概述: The fit is perfect. The feel is soft and elegant. I LOVE IT!!
评论详情: I absolutely love it. I didn't want to take it off. It fits me perfectly. I'm 5'5 and 175 lbs. I wear both Large and XL but ordered an XL and I'm glad I did. The shirt fits perfectly over my rump which is nicely shaped. The material feels so good against my skin.  I decided to order 2 more in different colors to wear with some leggings. This is the first review I've written but not the first item I've purchased. Again, I LOVE IT!!

Love it but I had to return the medium that I usually buy for an extra large! That's how small they run.  It was worth the hassle though. I loved it so much (once it fit) that I went back and ordered an extra one in navy.  Long, covers hips (perfect for leggings) and flattering. It molds to your shape. Not bulky.
The length is perfect, just the right amount of stretch not to much very soft not scratchie on the skin, perfect color of green exactly what I expected love, love

I love this tunic! It's the perfect length to wear with leggings. Although I'm not a "hoodie" person, I really love the material and how good the quality is for the price. I was very impressed. I am considering buying another color. The fit is as expected. I'm always a 2XL in items I buy from Amazon. I'm XL in the real world. I am 40DD on top and it fits like a glove. Just buy it, you won't regret it!

Nice soft material. This is a comfortable lightweight material. I am 5’7 and weigh 175. I have long legs, average arms,average torso length, and tend to carry my weight in my abdomen. I am a 38C bra. XL was the perfect fit as it isn’t too clingy in the stomach area but is more fitted in the other areas. This is not a tunic length, but you don’t have to worry about raising your arms and your belly popping out.

I ordered a Large (and I'm noramlly a medium) because I wanted this to flow nicely.  But it turned out to run really small and even a Large was too tight to what I wanted it to feel.  So I returned it.  Lovely color and feel.I ordered in a larger size :) hoping for the best this time

I love this casual hoodie. It was a little on the expensive side for a hoodie, but I wanted a longer one. This is a true tunic. I’m 200lb, pear shape (most of the weight in my belly). This hoodie is perfectly long, but shaped with open sides. It is not a warmth hoodie, it is long sleeved, but not very warm, very lightweight, which is what I wanted. Perfect for what I wanted.
I just ordered 2 more. This top is so comfy and fits perfectly. A little room to shrink too. I love how long it is. 😀

评论概述: The material is light and comfortable and it fits very well
评论详情: I am always hesitant to purchase clothes online but this was exactly what I was looking for. The material is light and comfortable and it fits very well. I did go up one size from what I would normally buy based on other people's reviews and that was for the best because it fits perfectly now. And the hood is actually a decent size that covers my whole head and I can wear it further back if I want to and that stays comfortably too.

I love this hoodie. It is definitely a fitted hoodie and the long part is kinda flowy. I got the normal size I would get in most clothing and I am okay with how it fits. I did not want an oversized hoodie. I wear this to workout and it works perfectly for that. The back is long enough that it covers your butt. The only advice I have to give is put knots on the end of the string before washing.

I love this. I bought it for my jammies. I love how light weight and roomy it is. The strings are super long which I don't super love but I just sleep in it so it's not a big deal. I bought a size bigger than my size just for comfort and I really probably could have stayed in my size and still been extra comfy.

评论概述: I used the size chart and the fit was perfect though had to order a size larger than I ...
评论详情: I used the size chart and the fit was perfect though had to order a size larger than I normally would. I really like this top a lot. I wear it with leggings as it covers all the appropriate areas without looking boxy or frumpy.  The fabric is thin (not like a true sweatshirt) and not very warm but wearing a tank underneath solves that problem. I would recommend this top and will probably buy more in different colors. .

评论概述: Color is very pretty and fabric is good.
评论详情: I returned it. Somewhat the fit around the bottom was way too boxy and not too flattering. It looked like a little tent on me. Overall it is a good top, sewing and material is nice.

I wanted a simple long hoodie for morning walks. I love the color, and the length. The only downside right now is that it's made with a heavy fabric, and very warm.  It will be great in winter, but a wee bit warm in the spring and summer.

I am really happy with this purchase. The material is high quality and fits perfect. I got a XL size and I am 5.5 about 150 usually wear mediums or mostly large sizes. in sweaters or shirts. Very happy with purchase. Maroon color is very nice.

评论概述: The blue is not as it appears
评论详情: I loved the look of the blue online, appeared to be a deep blue/navy, but it’s BRIGHT cobalt. Disappointed.

评论概述: It did wash and hang dry nicely. I can wear it and the fabric is ...
评论详情: Usually wear a large loosely, large is a bit snug. It did wash and hang dry nicely. I can wear it and the fabric is very comfortable but I'm glad I bought the other color in an extra large. Cute Cut, accents your shape as it does in the picture.
Loved this color, camo green. It's comfortable, soft, and flattering.

评论概述: Not long enough, but material is so soft.
评论详情: I love the tunic but it is somewhat small. I’m 5’5” and normally wear a small or size 4. I read the reviews so I ordered a large because I wanted it to fully cover my backside so I could wear it with leggings in public. It hits just below my rear. The material is so soft so I will be keeping it but not long enough for me. The sleeves and shoulders fit like a medium.
It was ok great fit though.

I absolutely love this shirt. The material is so soft and comfortable and it fits great. I wear mostly leggings in the winter and this shirt is the perfect length. It's machine washable so the maintenance is super easy and doesn't require anything extra as far as washing goes. This is a very cute casual shirt and the fact that it has a hood and pocket is a nice bonus. I am very very happy with this purchase and plan to purchase more.

I really do love this top! I purchased two colors, and both are very true to what is shown. I love the fit and length. I am 145 5'6" and usually wear a medium. I ordered a Large because of the cut; I assumed it would be a slender cut and it is. I will probably order more colors, as I can see this being a Fall and Winter staple.

I absolutely loved this hoodie! I bought 3 more colors already and I plan on buying a few more. It's perfect just warm enough without being too bulky and it's flattering at the same time. Buy it you'll love it!
I’m 5’3 approx 170 lbs bought a size 2xl. It fit as I expected it too, including the arms being too long. I have short arms. It’s roomy and long enough to cover for leggings.
Cute shirt but seemed to run a little small. I recommend ordering a size up

评论概述: Sizing small compared to the RBX sweatshirt/tunic I just bought
评论详情: I'm a size 10 top and this was way too snug. I washed it in cold and line dried it - It's comfy and super cute but just was too tight. A large didn't fit me well around the chest and back area. There is also a section of the pocket that the stitching isn't connected to the shirt... The hood is a nice size. One size up and I think I'd get this again if given the chance... maybe I should return...

I was super skeptical about how this would fit. Order a size up. I normally wear large so I got an xl. Perfect. Material is more rayon feel than cotton which I actually like better. Flattering fit and length is perfect for jeans, skirt or leggings. Easy fit under jacket as well. I will definitely order again. I love love love it! Exactly what I've been looking for. I would not advise washer/dryer tho. Hand wash only.

评论概述: Very comfortable, though runs a bit small..
评论详情: This is a very comfortable top! I normally wear a small but ordered a medium based off other recommendations. I'm glad I did! It is a little smaller than expected. The material is stretchy and light - perfect for my growing pregnancy bump.

评论概述: Fabric not consistent. Different from previous purchase!!!
评论详情: Top that came in is loose and nothing like my previous purchase. I used buy again option.

Love love love!!! This is a perfect tunic length hoodie to go with leggings. Bought it for a Halloween fox costume and ended up loving it as part of my wardrobe. It’s so cozy and figure flattering. I am large up top and it shows my shape better than most things that tent out. Going to purchase this in multiple colors!

Great quality but VERY tight fitting. Would need to order at least one size up. I'm 5.2 and 124 pounds. Got size med. and gave to my daughter who wears a small.  If you are busty....order a larger size.

I wish it was a little longer to go over my butt, but as I'm 5'9" that rarely happens with these tunic dress type items.  That being said it is extremely comfortable and the sleeves were plenty long enough!
I like this sweater since it’s not too thick or too thin. I’m hot natured, but it’s cold here right now. The color is a little off, but not too noticeable depending on what light you are in.

评论概述: Runs a little on the large side
评论详情: I ordered a xxl because asian sizes are usually small and I wanted extra roomy. But an xl would have been best. The sleeves are way to baggy
Material is soft and it looks so cute on.

I love these. I just ordered my third one today, in blue. I have the purple and the green and I can't say enough positive things about it. I'm 5'5", 135 lbs and the medium fits perfectly. I'm not bigger on top vs bottom or vise Versace but if you're pear shaped, I'd go up a size. I'm not big bottomed but it's a little less loose than I'd like it to be.

评论概述: This is AMAZINGLY comfortable. I got an XL and although it fits ...
评论详情: This is AMAZINGLY comfortable. I got an XL and although it fits snugly, just stretch the areas where it’s hugging too tight & it slightly relaxes in the areas. I wear these with leggings & its long enough where it covers the butt. I bought it in black & in the dark maroon/wine color — but now I just want in every color!
It looks like it's made really well, but in the description it says the material is Rayon. On the actual shirt the material is POLYESTER...

评论概述: I'll be purchasing a second one
评论详情: I really love this shirt. I bought it a few years back and it got a stain on it. I was actually going back to my purchase history so I can find it and buy it again. I figured I should leave a review. The material is so comfortable and it's pretty flattering.

I'm not much for these types of shirts. They tend to cling, but this shirt is very nice. It's soft, comfortable, easy to put on, easy to take off. The size is right on, and I didn't have to fuss with it throughout the day. If you can get this shirt, I recommend. It's very cute, and the teal color is perfection.
The only reason why i gave it 4 star is because by the second day it had little lint balls building up.

评论概述: Awsome tunic hoodie to wear with my St Patty's Day leggings!
评论详情: I did order the xl size and it was very nice fitting. I'm a 38C and it's not tight at all. I would normally buy a Lg but after reading reviews decided to go up a size - happy I did, it fits exactly as I like!

评论概述: Looks cute with Leggings and Skinny Pants
评论详情: Very cute look, the fabric tends to cling.  Tunic looks good with Leggins and Skinny Pants.  You can also layer it with a tight fitting top underneath for added warmth on cool days.

Wasn't sure what to expect but I was pleasantly surprised.  It's soft, fits well (I was concerned there was not a small so had to order a medium).  I'm 5' with a small frame and medium fit well.  Love so much I've ordered another in black.
I ordered a larger size than necessary because I wanted this to cover my behind. Really like that it is a light fabric that is breathable and easy to wear!

The usual thinner, rayon type fabric. CAN stretch it a bit but fit tighter in hip area than I'd like ( to be fair, larger hipped). I like the kangaroo pocket / scoop hem style, the price was low so I kept it. Black XXL

Color shown was a deep burnt orange/rusty color. Shirt sent is bright construction cone orange. I loved the fit and decided it might be good for cycling and being visible, so I kept it, but fabric is pilling now. I've only had it for a month.

I ordered this for the kangaroo pocket, but there's a line down the middle of it so it's really two pockets. So I don't use it that much because I can't put my phone in it. I am five two, 140 lb, and it fits over my hips.
